pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulations and Visualizations of Rubik's Cube (with Mods) // Provides simplified methods for managing classic Rubik's cubes and many other modifications of it (such as NxNxN size cubes, void cubes and 8-coloured cubes - so called octa cubes). Includes functions of handling special syntax for managing such cubes; and different approach to plotting 3D cubes without using external libraries (for example 'OpenGL').
